RequestOptions.Condition:
I want to make job description unbiased and eliminate workplace gender discrimination. I use the following rules:
1. Avoid using gender-charged words.
2. Use inclusive pronouns.
3. Make sure job titles are gender-neutral.
4. Closely consider the education requirements listed in the job posting. 
5. Express a commitment to equality and diversity. 
6. Put in place a blind resume and application screening process to avoid unconscious bias. 
7. Make sure candidates meet with both men and women during the interview process.
RequestOptions.AnalyzeText: Analyze job title and description and find issues and resolutions in form: issue-resolution:
RequestOptions.RewriteText: Rewrite job title and description to avoid bias and discrimination:
